text:
="preserve">Motjeka Madisha (12 January 1995 – 12 December 2020) was a South African professional soccer player. He played for Mamelodi Sundowns, as a defender. He also played for the national team from 2015 to 2020.
Madisha was killed in a car crash on 12 December 2020 in Kempton Park, Guateng at the age of 25.
